summary: The lives of Calcutta's most powerful Gunday, Bikram and Bala, changes when Nandita enters it. Then a counter-force takes charge and a thriller unfolds.
cast: Ranveer Singh|Arjun Kapoor|Priyanka Chopra|Irrfan Khan|Karan Aanand|Victor Banerjee|Prasanjit Chatterjee|Diwakar Dhayani|Darshan Gurjar|Uttam Halder|Susanta Joddar|Jayesh V. Kardak|Elly Meyers|Ajay Pathania|Deep Raj Rana|Anant Vidhaat Sharma|Saurabh Shukla|Gautam Siddhartha|Amritpal Singh
keywords: coal|1970s|no title at beginning|gangster|fight on train roof
title: Gunday
